page.title: 07 RELIGION
page.content: The area is predominantly Protestant with the majority of people worshipping at either the Church of England or Baptist Churches. The C.of.E Diocese is Peterborough. Denton Rector serves the parishes of Yardley Hastings, Grendon,and Castle Ashby.Hackleton village does not have its own church but at nearby Piddington and at Horton parishioners are able to attend services.Hackleton Baptist church is the Mother church of Denton Baptist church which was formed just over 100 years ago. There is no resident minister and the church relies on members of the 'Village Preachers Association' conducting the services every week. Roman Catholic Church members attend mass at Great Billing(Northampton).
